Query.Sentence: SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.pack p INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.image_pack ip ON p.pck_id=ip.pck_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.image i ON ip.img_id=i.image_id #WHERE# #ORDER#

WITH temp_table AS ( SELECT DISTINCT P.pck_id, P.pck_name, P.pck_description, P.pck_price, P.pck_participants, P.pck_days, P.creation_date, I.img_code, GC.gui_c_name FROM pack P INNER JOIN image_pack IP ON P.pck_id = IP.pck_id INNER JOIN image I ON IP.img_id = I.image_id INNER JOIN gui_cities GC ON P.gui_c_id = GC.gui_c_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT pck_id, pd_date_begin FROM pack_date WHERE pcs_id = 1 ) PD ON P.pck_id = PD.pck_id #WHERE# ) SELECT DISTINCT #COLUMNS# FROM temp_table

SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.pack P INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.image_pack IP ON P.pck_id=IP.pck_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.image I ON IP.img_id=I.image_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.gui_cities GC ON P.gui_c_id=GC.gui_c_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.pack_date PD ON P.pck_id=PD.pck_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.pack_booking PB ON PD.pd_id=PB.pd_id #WHERE# #ORDER#

SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.pack P INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.image_pack IP ON P.pck_id=IP.pck_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.image I ON IP.img_id=I.image_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.gui_cities GC ON P.gui_c_id=GC.gui_c_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.pack_date PD ON P.pck_id=PD.pck_id #WHERE# #ORDER# LIMIT 1;
SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.pack P ORDER BY P.pck_id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT Z.gui_z_name, COUNT(P.pck_id) AS province_count FROM ${mainschema}.pack P INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.gui_cities C ON P.gui_c_id = C.gui_c_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.gui_zone Z ON C.gui_z_id = Z.gui_z_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.pack_date PD ON P.pck_id = PD.pck_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.pack_state PS ON PD.pcs_id = PS.pcs_id WHERE PS.pcs_state IN ('reserved') GROUP BY Z.gui_z_name; #ORDER#

SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.pack P INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.image_pack IP ON P.pck_id=IP.pck_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.image I ON IP.img_id=I.image_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.gui_cities GC ON P.gui_c_id=GC.gui_c_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.pack_date PD ON P.pck_id=PD.pck_id INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.pack_booking PB ON PD.pd_id=PB.pd_id #WHERE# #ORDER# LIMIT 1;

select '>10' as rango, COUNT(*) AS days FROM ${mainschema}.pack P WHERE pck_days is not null and pck_days >10 union select '6-10' as rango, COUNT(*) AS days FROM ${mainschema}.pack P WHERE pck_days is not null and pck_days between 6 and 10 union select '1-5' as rango, COUNT(*) AS days from ${mainschema}.pack P WHERE pck_days is not null and pck_days between 1 and 5

SELECT rango, packs FROM ( SELECT '>50' AS rango, COUNT(*) AS packs, 4 AS orden FROM ${mainschema}.pack WHERE pck_price IS NOT NULL AND pck_price > 50 UNION SELECT '21-50' AS rango, COUNT(*) AS packs, 3 AS orden FROM ${mainschema}.pack WHERE pck_price IS NOT NULL AND pck_price BETWEEN 21 AND 50 UNION SELECT '11-20' AS rango, COUNT(*) AS packs, 2 AS orden FROM ${mainschema}.pack WHERE pck_price IS NOT NULL AND pck_price BETWEEN 11 AND 20 UNION SELECT '1-10' AS rango, COUNT(*) AS packs, 1 AS orden FROM ${mainschema}.pack WHERE pck_price IS NOT NULL AND pck_price BETWEEN 1 AND 10 ) AS subquery ORDER BY orden;

SELECT CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pd_date_begin) IN (12, 1, 2) THEN 'Winter' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pd_date_begin) IN (3, 4, 5) THEN 'Spring' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pd_date_begin) IN (6, 7, 8) THEN 'Summer' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pd_date_begin) IN (9, 10, 11) THEN 'Autumn' END AS estacion, COUNT(*) AS cantidad FROM ${mainschema}.pack_date GROUP BY CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pd_date_begin) IN (12, 1, 2) THEN 'Winter' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pd_date_begin) IN (3, 4, 5) THEN 'Spring' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pd_date_begin) IN (6, 7, 8) THEN 'Summer' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM pd_date_begin) IN (9, 10, 11) THEN 'Autumn' END ORDER BY estacion;

SELECT p.pck_id, p.pck_name, p.pck_description, p.pck_price, p.pck_participants, p.gui_c_id, I.img_code, GC.gui_c_name, COUNT(pd.pd_id) AS reservation_count FROM pack p JOIN pack_date pd ON p.pck_id = pd.pck_id JOIN ${mainschema}.image_pack IP ON P.pck_id=IP.pck_id JOIN ${mainschema}.image I ON IP.img_id = I.image_id JOIN ${mainschema}.gui_cities GC ON p.gui_c_id = GC.gui_c_id WHERE pd.pcs_id = 2 GROUP BY p.pck_id, p.pck_name, p.pck_description, p.pck_price, p.pck_participants, p.gui_c_id, I.img_code, GC.gui_c_name ORDER BY reservation_count DESC LIMIT 10;
